question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. fire hydrant
B. poles
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fire hydrant is clearly in the foreground, positioned between the camera and the poles, while the poles are slightly behind it, making the fire hydrant closer to the camera.
